td.content: s:a 22 yo white male student presents with increased moderate weakness, mild vague postprandial epigastric pain and moderate nausea over 10 months. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 1 year in his past denies any smoking o:Height 166 cm, Weight 64.8 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered Upper Endoscopy, CBC, Comprehensive Metabolic Panel, CEA.
